method.name: POST
method.doc: To create a new support file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the Support URI. Optionally, provide a list of categories and their instances in the POST Body to control the contents of support file.

request.doc: POST https://{appliance_hostname}/support POST_DATA: { "comment":"This is a new support file", "wrp":["instanceName", "instanceName2" ...], "isam_runtime":[], "lmi":[], "cluster":[], "felb":[], "aac_federation":[], "system":[] }

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: comment
param.doc: The comment to be associated with the support file.

response.doc: 200 OK Content-Type:application/json { "id":"4a5d2334245c3e780dcf9c60e620eaea", "message":"The support file was created.", "result":"success" }

param.name: id
param.doc: An SHA-256 hash of the support file's filename

param.name: message
param.doc: A message about the result of the request

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
